description.zh-cn: 战国时期著名的纵横家，提倡连横策略，为秦惠王重用，先后任秦国、魏国、楚国相国。
description.en: A prominent strategist of the Warring States period, known for advocating the 'Lianheng' (Horizontal Alliance) strategy. He was highly regarded by King Huiwen of Qin and served as chancellor for the states of Qin, Wei, and Chu.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期人物，纵横家鼻祖，苏秦和张仪的老师。
description.en: A figure from the Warring States period, considered the founder of the School of Diplomacy and the teacher of Su Qin and Zhang Yi.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期纵横家，与张仪同为鬼谷子门下。
description.en: A strategist of the Warring States period, and a fellow student of Zhang Yi under Guiguzi.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期纵横家，提倡合纵策略，是张仪的主要政治对手。
description.en: A strategist of the Warring States period who advocated the 'Hezong' (Vertical Alliance) strategy, making him Zhang Yi's primary political rival.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，重用张仪推行连横策略。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qin who heavily relied on Zhang Yi to implement the 'Lianheng' strategy.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，秦惠王之子。因与张仪有隙，张仪在其即位后离开秦国。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qin, son of King Huiwen. Due to his animosity towards Zhang Yi, Zhang Yi left Qin after he ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期楚国相国。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Chu during the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期楚国君主，曾被张仪以割让土地为名欺骗，导致齐楚联盟破裂。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Chu during the Warring States period. He was deceived by Zhang Yi with a promise of land, which led to the rupture of the alliance between Qi and Chu.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期前蜀的开国皇帝，于天汉元年（917年）追封张仪为昌化王。
description.en: The founding emperor of Former Shu during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, who posthumously ennobled Zhang Yi as the Prince of Changhua in 917 AD.

description.zh-cn: 孟子的弟子，曾称赞公孙衍、张仪为大丈夫。
description.en: A disciple of Mencius who once praised Gongsun Yan and Zhang Yi as great men.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期儒家代表人物，景春是其弟子。
description.en: A representative figure of Confucianism during the Warring States period; Jing Chun was his disciple.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 由魏国相邦公孙衍发起的五国合纵攻秦的战役。
description.en: A battle initiated by Gongsun Yan, the chancellor of Wei, leading a coalition of five states against Qin.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期魏国都城，位于今山西夏县，是张仪的出生地。
description.en: The capital of the State of Wei during the Warring States period, located in modern-day Xia County, Shanxi. It is the birthplace of Zhang Yi.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期由张仪等人倡导的外交策略，主张事奉一个强国以攻击其他弱国，破坏了六国合纵。
description.en: A diplomatic strategy advocated by Zhang Yi during the Warring States period, which proposed allying with a strong state to attack weaker ones, thereby undermining the 'Hezong' (Vertical Alliance) of the six other major states.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期由公孙衍、苏秦等人倡导的外交策略，主张联合多个弱国抵抗一个强国。
description.en: A diplomatic strategy advocated by Gongsun Yan and Su Qin during the Warring States period, which proposed forming a 'vertical alliance' of weaker states to resist a single powerful state.

description.zh-cn: 张仪是鬼谷子的徒弟。
description.en: Zhang Yi was a disciple of Guiguzi.

description.zh-cn: 与苏秦同为鬼谷子门下。根据《史记》记载，苏秦曾用计助张仪入秦，但据马王堆出土的《战国纵横家书》，二人活跃时期不同。
description.en: He was a fellow student of Su Qin under Guiguzi. According to the 'Records of the Grand Historian', Su Qin once maneuvered to help Zhang Yi enter the service of Qin, but according to the 'Warring States Vertical and Horizontal Alliances Texts' unearthed at Mawangdui, their active periods did not align.

description.zh-cn: 张仪的连横策略与公孙衍的合纵策略相对立，两人是战国中期的主要政治对手。
description.en: Zhang Yi's 'Lianheng' strategy was in direct opposition to Gongsun Yan's 'Hezong' strategy, making them major political rivals in the mid-Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 张仪在秦国担任相国，受秦惠王重用，推行连横策略。
description.en: Zhang Yi served as the Chancellor of Qin, was highly valued by King Huiwen, and implemented the 'Lianheng' strategy.

description.zh-cn: 重用张仪为相国，支持其连横策略。
description.en: He heavily relied on Zhang Yi as his chancellor and supported his 'Lianheng' strategy.

description.zh-cn: 秦武王向来与张仪不和，其即位后，张仪于公元前310年离开秦国。
description.en: King Wu of Qin had long-standing animosity towards Zhang Yi. After King Wu's accession, Zhang Yi left Qin in 310 BC.

description.zh-cn: 公元前322年，张仪担任魏国相国。
description.en: In 322 BC, Zhang Yi served as the chancellor of the State of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 公元前319年，魏国将张仪驱逐回秦国。
description.en: In 319 BC, the State of Wei expelled Zhang Yi, forcing him to return to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 张仪早年曾任楚国相国昭阳的门下客。
description.en: In his early years, Zhang Yi served as a retainer to Zhao Yang, the chancellor of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 因怀疑张仪偷窃和氏璧，昭阳的下人将张仪殴打数百下。
description.en: Suspecting Zhang Yi of stealing the He Shi Bi (a famous jade disc), Zhao Yang's servants had him beaten several hundred times.

description.zh-cn: 公元前313年，张仪担任楚国相国。
description.en: In 313 BC, Zhang Yi served as the chancellor of the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 张仪以割让商於六百里土地为诱饵，欺骗楚怀王与齐国断交。
description.en: Zhang Yi deceived King Huai of Chu into breaking his alliance with Qi by falsely promising to cede six hundred li of territory in Shangyu.

description.zh-cn: 张仪是连横策略的主要倡导者和执行者。
description.en: Zhang Yi was the primary advocate and executor of the 'Lianheng' (Horizontal Alliance) strategy.

description.zh-cn: 通过游说各国，多次瓦解公孙衍等人组织的合纵抗秦联盟。
description.en: By persuading various states, he repeatedly dismantled the 'Hezong' (Vertical Alliance) anti-Qin coalitions organized by Gongsun Yan and others.

description.zh-cn: 苏秦是鬼谷子的徒弟。
description.en: Su Qin was a disciple of Guiguzi.

description.zh-cn: 公孙衍是合纵策略的主要倡导者之一，与张仪的连横策略对抗。
description.en: Gongsun Yan was one of the main proponents of the 'Hezong' (Vertical Alliance) strategy, opposing Zhang Yi's 'Lianheng' strategy.

description.zh-cn: 公元前319年，公孙衍由魏将升任魏相邦，并发起函谷关之战，联合五国攻秦。
description.en: In 319 BC, Gongsun Yan was promoted from a general to the chancellor of Wei and initiated the Battle of Hangu Pass, leading a coalition of five states to attack Qin.

description.zh-cn: 于天汉元年（917年）正月，追封张仪为昌化王。
description.en: In the first month of the Tianhan era (917 AD), he posthumously ennobled Zhang Yi as the Prince of Changhua.

description.zh-cn: 景春曾称赞张仪为“一怒而诸侯惧，安居而天下熄”的大丈夫。
description.en: Jing Chun once praised Zhang Yi as a great man of whom it was said, 'When he is angry, all the princes are afraid. When he is quiet, the fire of war is extinguished throughout the empire.'

description.zh-cn: 景春是孟子的弟子。
description.en: Jing Chun was a disciple of Mencius.
